title: Task 1
body: Object Destructuring: The require('node:fs') returns an object containing all the methods and properties of the fs module. The destructuring assignment extracts the unlinkSync method from that object and binds it to the unlinkSync variable.

title: Task 2
body: This technique helps you to directly access methods or properties without needing to reference them as fs.methodName

title: Task 3
body: Make sure that the module you're destructuring supports this style and that you're using a version of Node.js that supports the 'node:module' import style if you're using 'node:fs'.
